title: Frank Rizzo
summary: Francis Lazarro Rizzo (October 23, 1920 â€“ July 16, 1991) was an American police officer and politician. He served as Philadelphia police commissioner from 1968 to 1971 and mayor of Philadelphia from 1972 to 1980. He was a member of the Democratic Party throughout the entirety of his career in public office. However, he later switched to the Republican Party in 1986 and campaigned as a Republican for the final five years of his life.
